latest_revision.text:
We have the Aoyue 968 unit.  

=Replacement=
sra-solder.com seems like a great site for replacement parts.  The only problem is the soldering tips section is really vague and has fake pictures for all tips.  I found it necessary to look up the tip model numbers with the company Aoyue is biting, hakko.  http://www.hakkousa.com/products.asp?CID=192,212 and lookup the vague solder tip numbers to get real pictures and descriptions of those tips.
